messages.content:
ACME CORP LAUNCHES AI‑POWERED SCHEDULER

SAN FRANCISCO, CA – May 15, 2025 – Acme Corp today announced the launch of its next‑generation AI‑Powered Scheduler, an innovative tool that uses predictive analytics to automatically arrange meetings across time zones. The Scheduler is designed to eliminate the friction of coordinating calendars for global teams.

\"This tool will cut scheduling friction for teams worldwide,\" said Jane Doe, VP of Product at Acme Corp. \"Our customers can now focus on what truly matters – collaboration – while the Scheduler handles the logistics.\"

The AI‑Powered Scheduler integrates seamlessly with existing calendar platforms and supports multi‑language inputs, making it ideal for enterprises operating internationally. Key features include:
- Predictive meeting time suggestions based on participants' availability and preferences.
- Automatic time‑zone conversion and daylight‑saving adjustments.
- Real‑time conflict detection and resolution.

Acme Corp continues its mission to empower businesses with AI‑driven productivity solutions. For more information, visit https://acme.com/scheduler.

Keywords: AI‑Powered Scheduler, automatic meeting scheduling, predictive analytics, cross‑time‑zone meetings, productivity tool.
I’ll proofread the draft for grammar, style, and brand tone.
